title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\Table\ClusterState
name: ClusterState
description:
The state of a table's data in a particular cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.admin.v2.Table.ClusterState

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.replication_state
params.description: Output only. The state of replication for the table in this cluster.

params.name: data.encryption_info
params.description: Output only. The encryption information for the table in this cluster. If the encryption key protecting this resource is customer managed, then its version can be rotated in Cloud Key Management Service (Cloud KMS). The primary version of the key and its status will be reflected here when changes propagate from Cloud KMS.

methods.description:
